Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus bud and tendril in faded added white outline with added red centre; top of rim glazed; exterior: dot band dilute lines at rim. Graffito on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '54' is written in pencil on the interior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1972) (phase 2)
